about_the_game:
Drive Away the Goblins Invading the Town Not with Sermons, but with Lead Bullets!

Use the modern firearms prepared at the facility to mow down the enemies!

Game Overview:
'Wurzelnsisters' is an action shooting game where the player controls Sister Nekono to protect the town from invading goblins. Sister Nekono uses various modern firearms to fend off the hordes of goblins.

Main Gameplay Elements:

Playable Character: Sister Nekono
Enemies: Hordes of goblins (lightweight and silent goblins, loud-footed orcs, goblins carrying bomb barrels)
Objective: Prevent the goblins from invading and protect the town
Firearms: Modern firearms prepared at the facility (rifles, shotguns, machine guns, etc.)
Game Features:

Strategic Shooting: Employ strategies to safely defeat enemies from a distance
Diverse Enemies: Multiple goblins with different behavior patterns and strengths
Area Defense: Defend specific areas while halting enemy advances
Resource Management: Manage ammunition and health packs effectively
Content:

Normal Mode: A mode where you repel goblins that have invaded the town.
Endless Mode: A mode where you challenge goblins until you are defeated.
No Item Mode: A game mode where no items exist outside of the church.

Enhancement features through points.
Unlock your favorite weapons.
Health enhancement features.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

publishers: ネコノミアぷろじぇくと
short_description: Cute Shooting Game: Drive Away the Goblins Attacking the Town with Modern Firearms!
